site.name: Grandeur
site.description: Experience unparalleled luxury at Grandeur - where timeless elegance meets modern sophistication. A 5-star sanctuary for discerning travelers.

seo.title: Grandeur - 5-Star Luxury Hotel & Resort
seo.description: Discover exceptional hospitality at Grandeur. World-class amenities, exquisite dining, and breathtaking views await you at our prestigious 5-star hotel.

hero.description: We help discerning travelers discover extraordinary stays with clarity—featuring curated accommodations and seamless luxury service.

about.headline: Our mission leads you to unforgettable stays
about.description: We support discerning travelers with exceptional hospitality that streamlines comfort, elevates experiences, and brings tranquility.

features.title: Luxury Experience
features.description: We curate every detail of your stay, from premium amenities to personalized services. Each moment is designed to exceed expectations.

features.title: Tailored Service
features.description: We assess your preferences, anticipate your needs, and craft bespoke experiences. Every detail is refined to ensure perfection.

places.title: Grand Lobby
places.description: The grand lobby is the heart of the hotel—a space designed for comfort, elegance, and first impressions.

places.title: Fine Dining
places.description: The restaurant serves as the hotel's centerpiece—a place crafted for exquisite cuisine and memorable evenings.

places.title: Luxury Spa
places.description: The spa is a sanctuary of wellness—a tranquil space meant for relaxation, rejuvenation, and inner peace.

places.title: Infinity Pool
places.description: The pool anchors the hotel—offering a haven for leisure, serenity, and breathtaking views.

places.title: Rooftop Bar
places.description: The rooftop bar elevates your experience—designed for sunset cocktails, city views, and unforgettable nights.

floor.headline: Explore every level with our detailed floor planning

rooms.name: Deluxe Room
rooms.description: The deluxe room is the essence of comfort—a space designed for relaxation, style, and modern living. It typically features premium bedding, a work desk, and stunning city views.

details.available: King Bed, City View, Rain Shower, Mini Bar

rooms.name: Premier Suite
rooms.description: The premier suite offers spacious luxury—a haven crafted for extended stays with separate living area, panoramic views, and exclusive amenities for the discerning guest.

details.available: Living Room, King Bed, Jacuzzi, Butler Service

rooms.name: Presidential Suite
rooms.description: The presidential suite is the pinnacle of luxury—featuring a private terrace, formal dining room, and personalized 24/7 butler service for the ultimate indulgence.

details.available: Master Suite, Terrace, Dining Room, Study, Butler Pantry

rooms.name: The Penthouse
rooms.description: The penthouse is an exclusive sky residence—offering 360-degree views, private pool, rooftop garden, and unmatched privacy for those who seek the extraordinary.

details.available: 3 Bedrooms, Private Pool, Garden, Chef Kitchen, Cinema

featuredCard.label: Award-winning excellence
featuredCard.headline: 50k+ guests choose our trusted luxury hotels
featuredCard.description: Choosing us matters — experience and personalized service shape every memorable stay. We help guests create unforgettable moments with confidence.

stats.label: Satisfaction rate
stats.description: Guests consistently rate their experience as exceptional across all our properties.

stats.label: Return guests
stats.description: More than 80% of our guests return for another stay within two years.

stats.label: Awards won
stats.description: Recognized globally by leading hospitality and travel publications.

stats.label: Recommend us
stats.description: Most guests recommend our hotels after experiencing our signature service.

cities.headline: Featured cities
cities.description: Experience the Grandeur difference across our collection of prestigious properties in the world's most coveted destinations.

locations.description: Rising majestically on the Palm, offering unrivaled views of the Arabian Gulf.
A Haussmanian gem steps from the Champs-Elysees, embodying French elegance.
An iconic Manhattan landmark overlooking Central Park's lush landscapes.
Where traditional Japanese hospitality meets contemporary luxury.
A regal residence in Mayfair, steeped in British heritage and sophistication.

items.name: Maria Thompson
items.quote: Grandeur made our anniversary celebration incredibly special. Their attention to detail, responsiveness, and personalized service helped us create memories that will last forever.

items.name: Brian Ruiz
items.quote: We felt supported through every step. Clear communication, quick responses, and genuine care made our entire stay smooth and stress-free.

items.name: Sarah Mitchell
items.quote: The business facilities are exceptional. From the meeting rooms to the high-speed WiFi, everything was perfectly suited for productive work trips.

items.name: David Chen
items.quote: Traveling with kids can be challenging, but Grandeur made it effortless. The staff went above and beyond to ensure our whole family felt welcome.

items.question: How does the booking process work?
items.answer: We begin with understanding your preferences, travel dates, and room requirements. Our team then presents tailored options, arranges viewings if needed, and guides you through booking and payment. Every step is supported with clarity and transparency to ensure a smooth experience from start to finish.

items.question: Do you help with airport transfers?
items.answer: Yes, we offer complimentary luxury airport transfers for all suite guests. Standard room guests can arrange transfers for a fee. Our fleet includes Mercedes S-Class and Rolls-Royce vehicles for your comfort.

items.question: Can you coordinate special occasions and events?
items.answer: Absolutely. We arrange personalized celebrations, romantic dinners, and special events to ensure your occasion exceeds expectations. Our dedicated events team handles every detail before you arrive.

items.question: Do you assist with dining reservations?
items.answer: Yes, our concierge team can arrange reservations at our five signature restaurants or recommend and book external dining experiences. We accommodate all dietary requirements with advance notice.

items.question: Are virtual tours available for international guests?
items.answer: Yes, we offer immersive virtual tours of our rooms, suites, and amenities for guests who cannot visit in person before booking. Contact our team to schedule a personalized video walkthrough.

contactCard.text: Have more questions? Our team is happy to help.

cta.headline: Let's plan your perfect stay
cta.subtitle: Ready to experience luxury? Our concierge team is here to help
